about_the_game:
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Pinball Edition"! Get ready to experience the thrill and excitement of one of the world's most beloved arcade games, right from the comfort of your own home.

In this game, you will enter the world of paper pinball, and take on the challenge of scoring as many points as possible by hitting targets and activating special features on the pinball machine. With realistic physics and intricate designs, the pinball machine comes to life, offering hours of addictive gameplay and endless fun.
